title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama, providing synchronous and async clients to run and chat with local models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, installable via npm, works in Node and browsers (with proxy).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama, exposing LLM, embeddings, and tool-calling wrappers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with multi-model chats, code highlighting, PDF uploads, and role management.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and Android support; published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama, offering idiomatic Ruby methods to list, pull, and chat with models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting, conversation history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline code copilots with autocomplete and explanations.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official C#/.NET client for Ollama with async streaming and support for .NET 6+.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chatbot UI for Ollama featuring Markdown rendering, code copy buttons, and responsive design.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and persistent storage options.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose examples for CPU and GPU setups including Open WebUI sidecar.

title: ollama-gpt-cli
summary: Bash script wrapper that adds persistent chat sessions and prompt templates to the Ollama CLI.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama with idiomatic Go APIs and streaming support.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app integrating Ollama models as chat endpoints with admin UI and REST API.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service exposing Ollama with OpenAI-compatible chat completions and embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama model responses into channels with slash commands and moderation hooks.
